features.TITLE: Scalability
features.TEXT: New transaction recording method supporting creation of separate branches in the system, with a custom ruleset tailored to solve any business problem, including the problem of quick and cheap handling a large number of transactions. These branches made of chains of blocks each containing a number of homogenous transactions.

features.TITLE: Scalability
features.TEXT: Most part of transactions have zero fees. Our architecture already supports macroblocks of unlimited size - a unique solution allowing our system protocol to scale in parallel with the growing overall computational power of the network.

features.TITLE: Speed
features.TEXT: High throughput allowing for up to 1 million transaction per second.

features.TITLE: Security
features.TEXT: Implementation of PoW + PoA (first case of real life implementation) + PoS algorithms makes the system 3 times more resistant to hacking.

features.TITLE: Security
features.TEXT: Enecuum Tickets allow to create dedicated branches where circulation of ENQ coins, the main system cryptocurrency, is not intended. A Ticket is both an access key to the corresponding branch and a decryption key for the transactions in this branch, and can be freely transferred between the users of the system. The key purpose of Ticket branches is to facilitate creation of a blockchain-based flexible environment for easy interaction between businesses and their customers.

features.TITLE: Security
features.TEXT: SHARNELL linear logic + JS as the smart contract language. High level of Enecuum’s smart contracts security is ensured by the business-oriented linear logic called SHARNELL. They are written in JavaScript and are easy and cheap to implement for a web developer. A reliable and secure means to perform your own ICO and issue your own Tokens.

features.TITLE: Security
features.TEXT: On-chain voting + test branch for a safe upgrade of the system. Support of various branches allows to create private branches with custom rulesets adapted to a particular business case.

TEXT.BLOCK_1: High throughput of the Enecuum blockchain enables startups to raise funds at any scale, without the risk of a network hang-up. This way all the investors can be sure they can participate in the ICO and quickly receive their Tokens.
TEXT.BLOCK_2: Smart contracts in Enecuum are implemented in JavaScript and are easy to write for a web developer. It significantly decreases the learning curve and cost of their creation. Linear logic at their base helps eliminate potential vulnerabilities in smart contracts and minimizes the risks of hacking.
TEXT.BLOCK_3: “Cancellation model” allows to implement complex crowdsales with step-by-step raising and return of the funds to the investors, at any stage of the process. System-specific notation of Tokens, similar to the ERC-20 notation, simplifies their entry to a cryptocurrency exchange service after the ICO.

TEXT.BLOCK_1: Enecuum’s Tickets and Marks aim to provide banks and government agencies with a reliable control over targeted spending of received credit and budget funds, and companies to conduct secure payments between themselves with no fear of sensitive information or trade secrets disclosure.
TEXT.BLOCK_2: Tickets intend to give banks a secure channel of communication when sharing a Ticket with Bank B, Bank A could give Bank B access to a private branch only holders of this Ticket could access to and only holders of this Ticket could decrypt transaction from.
TEXT.BLOCK_3: Another example could be when Bank A assings different Marks to its customersbased based on the nature of their business (construction company, industrial equipment supplier, etc). Bank A could then issue a client a directed loan in Tokens having a specific Mark. The client could only use these Tokens to pay certain predefined organizations, spending them according to the purpose of the loan.

TEXT.BLOCK_1: System ability to run “heavy” smart contracts in dedicated branches allows users to perform complex calculations that require high computational power without increasing workload on the main Enecuum branches (useful for neural network training, scientific calculations, rendering computer graphics, JS libraries and so on).
TEXT.BLOCK_2: Payment for using such “heavy” smart contracts is performed in ENQ coins at a flexible rate, similar to the transaction price concept in the Ethereum blockchain. Creating a request to perform the calculations, the customer sets the price and miners decide whether it is beneficial for them to provide their computational power for the task.
TEXT.BLOCK_3: In case miners agree to the terms, the customer’s funds are reserved by the smart contract for future payment. When the task is completed and valid results are provided, the funds are released and automatically transferred to the miners.

TEXT.BLOCK_1: Effective use of disk space on user’s devices achieved through sharding and change of the transaction duplication parameters.
TEXT.BLOCK_2: For example, if 4 users provide 5 GB of space each and the duplication and sharding parameters set to 50%, the effective storage capacity for files is 10 GB. Extrapolating this pattern to the entire network, the size of the “global decentralized disk” will grow proportionally preserving availability of the data and a sufficiently high speed of access. That means users can build on top of the Enecuum blockchain such services as decentralized hostings, cloud data storage services and content delivery networks.
TEXT.BLOCK_3: Applying SHARNELL Smart Contracts, and Tickets as encryption keys on top of such data branches, users can create complex paid access services with decentralized and immutable content paid for in Tokens.

TEXT.BLOCK_1: Support of separate branches with their own consensus rulesets that stimulates miners’ activity creates conditions beneficial for implementation of micro-transaction services.
TEXT.BLOCK_2: Zero transaction fee for a decentralized micro-transaction service. Extremely low fee per transaction in case of a centralization when a service makes a lot of micro-transactions from a single wallet. For example, 10,000,000 transactions a day can be easily recorded in several large macroblocks of ~120 MB each. The fee will be calculated per block, and will be very low per transaction.
TEXT.BLOCK_3: This is a perfect case for an Internet of Things-based service. A simple PoA mining client running on various devices will be able to completely cover their carried transaction fees. A mesh network, supported by the Enecuum protocol, between these devices provides a high availability.

TEXT.BLOCK_1: Proof of Work at Enecuum is based on an improved version of the Bitcoin-NG protocol modified for effective mining of many block of different types in parallel. This approach ensures high scalability the system.
TEXT.BLOCK_2: A custom version of the Cryptonight protocol (Keccak + AES + X11) aims to defend the system against centralization caused by Application-Specific Integrated Circuit devices.
TEXT.BLOCK_3: PoW miners calculate the block hash and hold their macroblocks open for PoA miners to fill it with microblocks containing transactions.

TEXT.BLOCK_1: Proof of Activity at Eneecum is proposed to be applied at two different stages.
TEXT.BLOCK_2: First, PoA miners reach consensus to form teams of 64 participants. Second, every team validates a chain of 62 microblocks with 40 transaction each and publish them into the network - to the blocks opened by the PoW miners.
TEXT.BLOCK_3: PoA mining at Enecuum requires a wide and steady Internet connection, but low computational power and can be performed on mobile devices.

TEXT.BLOCK_1: PoS miners continuously re-check balances of all wallets in the system.
TEXT.BLOCK_2: The reward for PoS mining is flexible. The system defines the minimum and maximum balance thresholds outside of which a miner is not able to gain any reward.

list.title: Phone mining
list.description: Every smartphone on the network will participate in the publication of microblocks on a daily basis and receive a reward for this. This opens doors of the crypto world to millions of new users. A user simply needs to download the Enecuum App, which places a light processing load on the smartphone - comparable to a traditional messenger app.

list.title: Decentralization
list.description: Millions of smartphones connect to the Enecuum network from around the world, creating a truly decentralized system. It is impossible to steal any file from the network because the data is chunked and stored on millions of different devices, which makes the network extremely secure.

list.title: Proof-of-Activity node
list.description: According to statistics, on average people utilize only about 10% of the data processing capabilities of their smartphone. Enecuum actually "leases" the unused resources of the smartphone and rewards the device owner for this. The smartphone becomes part of a huge network, and a special algorithm uses the power of each device most effectively. This algorithm is called Proof-of-Activity.

list.title: Breakthrough technology
list.description: Enecuum can provide the facility of individual calculation of insurance policies for each client, offering both full transparency and the inability to "cheat" the system on the part of either the policy provider or the client. Our technology will reduce the cost of insurance for the client while protecting insurance companies from fraudsters.

list.title: HyperDAG
list.description:
Imagine if a chef in a restaurant were to cook each meal sequentially, one after the another. In addition, some visitors made identical orders, or even ordered individual components to create their own dish. In such a scenario, most visitors will not wait for their orders because it takes too long for the chef to get to them.

It is therefore more profitable to prepare the meals in parallel. Then many dishes are prepared nearly simultaneously, resulting in a much greater speed of service.

Our HyperDAG technology does exactly that, as it allows the creation of many parallel tasks which are solved by the hundreds of thousands of smartphones that are part of the network. In fact, the greater the number of smartphones exist in the network, the more quickly these parallel tasks are solved. It is thanks to this technology that Enecuum is unique and indeed, a one-of-a-kind blockchain.

list.title: Hybrid consensus algorithm
list.description: Most blockchains use one of three types of algorithms: Proof-of-Work (this one is the most secure, but is slow), Proof-of-Stake (the cheapest, but not decentralized enough) and Proof-of-Activity (the fastest and most decentralized). Enecuum took the best of all three algorithms in creating its own Hybrid Consensus Algorithm.

list.title: SHARDING
list.description:
The personal data of millions of people are stored on the Internet. Hackers regularly gain access to bank accounts or personal correspondence of a great number of people. If your photo is on any server, it can be stolen if a hacker gains access to this server. 

This problem can be solved only in one way – to store personal data in decentralized systems.
Now imagine that your photo is torn into 1,000 pieces, and each piece resides in a different place. Only you can put them back together, because you have a unique key, which tells you how and where to instantly collect and reassemble this 1000-piece puzzle. Even if attackers were able to steal this information from multiple devices, they would not be able to reassemble it and use it without your key.

Each of the pieces is duplicated several times on different devices, so that you can access this photo at any time from anywhere in the world. This is done by using a decentralized application and the technology called Sharding.

list.title: SHARNELL smart contracts
list.description:
Smart Contract technology allows you to enter into secure transactions between two or more parties around the world instantly, and without the involvement of expensive lawyers.
Why is it called "smart"? Until recently, to conclude any deal, you had to draw up a contract, obtain signatures from all interested parties, and then wait several days for payment. All these processes required a lot of time and significant resources. With the introduction of the electronic signature, the process became somewhat faster, but the “red tape” and “human factor” did not disappear.

Let's say you live in Germany and want to buy 10 tons of bananas from Brazil. Previously, you would need to find a supplier, sign a contract with him, purchase bananas, control logistics, and so on. Each stage in the process would be agreed to by a specific agreement the involved parties had to agree to. At the same time, at every stage there is a risk of fraud by any counterparty.

With an "intelligent" contract, everything is much simpler and safer. The system will automatically transfer money throughout the chain at the time of the transaction. It is impossible to deceive the contractor in this situation, since all data is contained in the blockchain and any transaction can be checked if necessary.
Smart contracts are no longer the province of lawyers, but of good programmers. However, the problem is that the languages for writing smart contracts in different blockchains are at present quite new, and the development community is small. Because of this, the cost of the development of smart contracts is usually very high, and the quality of the code is lower than expected.

Enecuum solved this problem by using a variation of linear logic called SHARNELL to write smart contracts. One of its key feautres is that it simply will not allow the execution of a smart contract that is written with an error. In addition, the main language for creating smart contracts in Enecuum will be the most common programming language in the world - JavaScript, which will not only allow the programmer to develop contracts faster, but also save substantial money on it.

list.title: Changing the world
list.description: Enecuum is an ideal platform for companies that need a fast, secure, decentralized blockchain. The scope of industries where Enecuum's innovative technologies can be applied is vast. We are pleased to create a technology that can radically facilitate the work so many areas of life and business: from the possibility of free mobile communication for subscribers to the organization of fair elections at any level.

list.title: Science
list.description: The computing power of Enecuum can be used to solve complex scientific problems, with the results available to any international scientific community.

list.title: Government
list.description:
Enecuum facilitates voting of any degree of complexity, and protects the voting results from falsification. The world has already seen elections take place using blockchain technology on an experimental basis. The outcomes of these experiments were found to be successful.
State organizations have the opportunity to safely store citizens’ personal data, to implement electronic document management everywhere, which greatly facilitates the receipt of public services by the population.

list.title: Education
list.description: Fake diplomas and certificates, fake academic degrees – these problems are still faced by the scientific community. Enecuum will provide transparency and authenticity of the documents. They cannot be rewritten or partially modified. Records will be stored in a decentralized network and will be accessible to everyone from anywhere in the world.

list.title: Logistic
list.description: Enecuum technology allows you to easily and safely manage the delivery of goods around the world. Logistics has never been so easy and convenient.

list.title: Energy
list.description: Each customer will only pay for the amount of electricity that he consumed. Through our SHARNELL Smart Contracts, Enecuum allows companies to create perfectly accurate invoices from the meter of each consumer on the power grid.

list.title: Software
list.description: Thanks to Enecuum, developers gain the opportunity to implement distributed applications of any complexity, without having to worry about the power of their physical servers.

list.title: Telecom
list.description: Enecuum can create opportunity for free mobile communication for subscribers and thousands of new customers for mobile operators. Enecuum opens new horizons for the Telecom sector. For the first time in history, the smartphone will actually generate passive income for its owner.

list.title: Medicine
list.description: You will now be able to get a prescription for a medicine in Argentina and purchase this medicine in Italy. Enecuum has made this possible thanks to our single decentralized storage network for your health records. This kind of global access never existed before, due to technical limitations. We at Enecuum have removed those limitations forever.

list.title: Insurance
list.description: Enecuum can provide the facility of individual calculation of insurance policies for each client, offering both full transparency and the inability to "cheat" the system on the part of either the policy provider or the client. Our technology will reduce the cost of insurance for the client while protecting insurance companies from fraudsters.

blockchain.title: Blockchain of tomorrow
blockchain.description: Enecuum allows each smartphone owner to become part of a global network and get rewarded for it. Crypto technologies should not belong to a small community of technological elite. On the contrary, everyone should have the opportunity to become part of a beautiful future. We make access to this advanced technology simple and easy. This is what the Blockchain of Tomorrow should be.
